set term svg
set output "speedup.svg"
set grid
set title "SpeedUp Plot"
set key autotitle columnhead
set yrange [0:]
set xlabel 'Num. Threads'
set xrange [0:]
set ylabel 'SpeedUp'
f(x) = x
plot f(x) t 'Optimal SpeedUp', 'results_speedup.data' u 1:2 w lp t 'rust-ssp', 'results_speedup.data' u 1:3 w lp t 'rayon', 'results_speedup.data' u 1:4 w lp t 'std-threads', 'results_speedup.data' u 1:5 w lp t 'ppl', 'results_speedup.data' u 1:6 w lp t 'ppl-tp'
